data.label:
LineNo: 16257090,

Narrator: As I stood in the Benievon Archsanc...
en


As I stood in the Benievon Archsanctuary, I marveled at the Lake of Reflection. Its waters flowed through naturally formed channels, weaving through the sanctuary's heart.

LineNo: 16257192,

Narrator: Standing within the Benievon Archsa...
en


Standing within the Benievon Archsanctuary, I marveled at the Lake of Reflection, its waters meandering gracefully through the heart of the sanctuary via naturally carved channels.

LineNo: 16257486,

Narrator: The Archsanctuary had been built ar...
en


The Archsanctuary had been built around these canals, embracing their presence in its design.

LineNo: 16257588,

Narrator: As I knelt at the water's edge, my...
en


As I knelt at the water's edge, my gaze fixed upon the mirrored surface, hoping for clarity amidst the distant echoes of protest resounding incessantly within my mind.

LineNo: 16257690,

Narrator: Despite seeking respite from the tu...
en


Despite seeking respite from the turmoil that plagued my realm, the unrest persisted in my thoughts, reverberating from far beyond the Archsanctuary's walls.

LineNo: 16257792,

Sal Ignacius: For many, living standards are a p...
en


"For many, living standards are a primary concern."

LineNo: 16258450,

Sal Ignacius: The decline in workers' rights has...
en


"The decline in workers' rights has stirred up quite the hornet's nest."

LineNo: 16258830,

Sal Ignacius: Lack of affordable housing is a de...
en


"Lack of affordable housing is a deeply troubling issue among Rizians."

LineNo: 16258932,

Sal Ignacius: Inaccessibility to social programs...
en


"Inaccessibility to social programs is said to be causing significant hardship, and exacerbating economic disparities, especially for marginalized populations."

LineNo: 16259868,

Sal Ignacius: The worsening housing crisis is a...
en


"The worsening housing crisis is a deeply troubling issue among Rizians."

LineNo: 16260248,

Sal Ignacius: Restrictions on the press, despite...
en


"Restrictions on the press, despite their aim to prevent the spread of harmful misinformation, have stirred significant public discontent."

LineNo: 16260350,

Narrator: With a furrowed brow, I attempted t...
en


With a furrowed brow, I attempted to silence the internal clamor, but the tumult of voices only grew louder.

LineNo: 16260452,

Narrator: My hands clenched into fists.
en


My hands clenched into fists.

LineNo: 16260570,

Player_Romus_Italic: In a moment of unchecked anger, I s...
en


In a moment of unchecked anger, I seized a nearby chalice and hurled it across the Archsanctuary, the echoes of its shattering reverberating through the stillness.

LineNo: 16260576,

Player_Romus_Italic: In a moment of unchecked anger, I s...
Menu Text en


Throw nearby chalice.

LineNo: 16260678,

Player_Romus_Italic: I closed my eyes and took a deep br...
en


I closed my eyes and took a deep breath to calm my rising frustration.

LineNo: 16260684,

Player_Romus_Italic: I closed my eyes and took a deep br...
Menu Text en


Take a deep breath.

LineNo: 16260786,

Player_Romus_Italic: Oh, shut up, will you?!
en


"Oh, shut up, will you?!"

LineNo: 16260792,

Player_Romus_Italic: Oh, shut up, will you?!
Menu Text en


Shout in frustration.

LineNo: 16260894,

Narrator: My voice echoed through the grand h...
en


My voice echoed through the grand hall, though it was only meant for the empty air.

LineNo: 16260996,

Sal Ignacius: I didn't say anything, Your Majest...
en


"I didn't say anything, Your Majesty."

LineNo: 16261194,

Narrator: I turned and faced the Grand Wisema...
en


I turned and faced the Grand Wiseman, who I hadn't heard enter.

LineNo: 16261312,

Player_Romus: Forgive me, Grand Wiseman. I didn'...
en


"Forgive me, Grand Wiseman. I didn't hear you come in."

LineNo: 16261414,

Player_Romus: For God's sake, don't sneak up on...
en


"For God's sake, don't sneak up on me like that!"

LineNo: 16261516,

Player_Romus: I wasn't referring to you, Grand W...
en


"I wasn't referring to you, Grand Wiseman, but rather to the distant shouts of protests that reverberate across the kingdom."

LineNo: 16261618,

Narrator: It was then that I noticed Sal stan...
en


It was then that I noticed Sal standing nearby. With a gentle grace, Sal retrieved the fallen chalice and approached, holding it out to me.

LineNo: 16261816,

Sal Ignacius: I believe you dropped something.
en


"I believe you dropped something."

LineNo: 16261934,

Player_Romus: No, kidding.
en


"No, kidding."

LineNo: 16262044,

Player_Romus: Ever heard of knocking?
en


"Ever heard of knocking?"

LineNo: 16262146,

Sal Ignacius: Forgive me, Your Majesty. I though...
en


"Forgive me, Your Majesty. I thought you heard me come in."

LineNo: 16262256,

Sal Ignacius: If you don't mind my asking, what...
en


"If you don't mind my asking, what seems to be the trouble?"

LineNo: 16262374,

Player_Romus_Italic: I didn't take the chalice back.
en


I didn't take the chalice back.

LineNo: 16262380,

Player_Romus_Italic: I didn't take the chalice back.
Menu Text en


Don't take chalice.

LineNo: 16262482,

Narrator: Sal waited a moment before setting...
en


Sal waited a moment before setting the chalice down on a nearby altar.

LineNo: 16262584,

Player_Romus_Italic: I took back the chalice and set it...
en


I took back the chalice and set it on the altar where I got it from.

LineNo: 16262590,

Player_Romus_Italic: I took back the chalice and set it...
Menu Text en


Take chalice.

LineNo: 16262788,

Sal Ignacius: There you are, Your Majesty. I was...
en


"There you are, Your Majesty. I was looking for you."

LineNo: 16262914,

Player_Romus: Well, you found me.
en


"Well, you found me."

LineNo: 16263016,

Player_Romus: Is there something you need?
en


"Is there something you need?"

LineNo: 16263118,

Player_Romus: Congratulations. You win the prize.
en


"Congratulations. You win the prize."

LineNo: 16263498,

Sal Ignacius: I came to inform you that the cere...
en


"I came to inform you that the ceremony is set to begin within the hour, so we'll need to start letting people into the Archsanctuary soon."

LineNo: 16263600,

Narrator: He was referring to the latest Wruh...
en


He was referring to the latest Wruhec's Guardians cadet graduates who had established their headquarters at the nearby Benievon Academy.

LineNo: 16263702,

Narrator: Despite the Board of Trustees' init...
en


Despite the Board of Trustees' initial resistance, they eventually committed to incorporating the Guardians' doctrine into the school's standard curriculum.

LineNo: 16263804,

Narrator: Thus, the ceremony provided a conve...
en


Thus, the ceremony provided a convenient excuse for my visit to Benievon amidst the unrest in Porte Drazon.

LineNo: 16264184,

Player_Romus: Sorry, I lost my temper. I've got...
en


"Sorry, I lost my temper. I've got a lot on my mind."

LineNo: 16264286,

Sal Ignacius: No need to apologize, Your Majesty...
en


"No need to apologize, Your Majesty. I can only imagine the weight of your responsibilities and the pressure you're under."

LineNo: 16264674,

Narrator: With a furrowed brow, I attempted t...
en


With a furrowed brow, I attempted to silence the internal clamor, but the tumult of voices only grew louder.

LineNo: 16265054,

Narrator: As I knelt at the water's edge, my...
en


"As I knelt at the water's edge, my gaze fixed upon the mirrored surface, amidst the distant echoes of protest resounding incessantly within my mind.

LineNo: 16265156,

Player_Romus: Forgive me. I didn't hear you come...
en


"Forgive me. I didn't hear you come in."

LineNo: 16265258,

Player_Romus: And what do I owe the pleasure, Gr...
en


"And what do I owe the pleasure, Grand Wiseman?"

LineNo: 16265360,

Sal Ignacius: No need to apologize, Your Majesty.
en


"No need to apologize, Your Majesty."

LineNo: 16265462,

Sal Ignacius: I hope I'm not interrupting. Never...
en


"I hope I'm not interrupting. Nevertheless..."

LineNo: 16265564,

Sal Ignacius: Not necessarily, Your Majesty.
en


"Not necessarily, Your Majesty."

LineNo: 16265666,

Sal Ignacius: Lucky me.
en


"Lucky me."

LineNo: 16265768,

Sal Ignacius: I just wanted to inform you that t...
en


"I just wanted to inform you that the ceremony is set to begin within the hour, so we'll need to start letting people into the Archsanctuary soon."

LineNo: 16265870,

Sal Ignacius: Ah, I see. In any case...
en


"Ah, I see. In any case..."

LineNo: 16265972,

Sal Ignacius: Not a problem Your Majesty.
en


"Not a problem Your Majesty."

LineNo: 16266074,

Sal Ignacius: My apologies. I didn't mean to sta...
en


"My apologies. I didn't mean to startle you."

LineNo: 16266176,

Narrator: Known for catering to the noble and...
en


Known for catering to the noble and elite class of Rizia, the Academy was considered one of the kingdom's most prestigious institutions.

LineNo: 16266278,

Player_Romus: I appreciate your concern, Sal. La...
en


"I appreciate your concern, Sal. Lately, it's been difficult to shake off the unrest plaguing our kingdom -- consuming my thoughts more than I'd like."

LineNo: 16266380,

Player_Romus: I'm deeply concerned about the see...
en


"I'm deeply concerned about the seemingly endless stream of issues impacting our nation."

LineNo: 16266482,

Player_Romus: That's none of your concern.
en


"That's none of your concern."

LineNo: 16266584,

Sal Ignacius: Very well. I won't press the issue.
en


"Very well. I won't press the issue."

LineNo: 16266686,

Sal Ignacius: I share your concern, Your Majesty...
en


"I share your concern, Your Majesty. Regrettably, the grievances they voice are as diverse as the shifting winds of change."

LineNo: 16266788,

Sal Ignacius: As am I, Your Majesty. Unfortunate...
en


"As am I, Your Majesty. Unfortunately, their concerns vary as wildly as the winds of change."

LineNo: 16267168,

Sal Ignacius: As has the lack of affordable hous...
en


"As has the lack of affordable housing."

LineNo: 16267270,

Sal Ignacius: As has the worsening housing crisi...
en


"As has the worsening housing crisis."

LineNo: 16267650,

Sal Ignacius: In addition, inaccessibility to so...
en


"In addition, inaccessibility to social programs is said to be causing significant hardship, and exacerbating economic disparities, especially for marginalized populations."

LineNo: 16267752,

Sal Ignacius: And restrictions on the press, des...
en


"And restrictions on the press, despite their aim to prevent the spread of harmful misinformation, have also stirred significant public discontent."

LineNo: 16268132,

Player_Romus: The people's complaints are irrele...
en


"The people's complaints are irrelevant. Their duty is to serve the kingdom, not complain about their living conditions."

LineNo: 16268234,

Player_Romus: There's only so much the governmen...
en


"There's only so much the government can do. Living standards are a matter for the citizens to manage."

LineNo: 16268336,

Player_Romus: It pains me deeply to hear of such...
en


"It pains me deeply to hear of such hardships among our people. We must do everything in our power to alleviate their suffering."

LineNo: 16268438,

Sal Ignacius: I'm in complete agreement, though,...
en


"I'm in complete agreement, though, I suspect the royal treasury doesn't share your sentiment."

LineNo: 16268540,

Sal Ignacius: For better or worse, they ultimate...
en


"For better or worse, they ultimately hold the power over such matters. In any case..."

LineNo: 16268642,

Player_Romus: We cannot ignore the plight of our...
en


"We cannot ignore the plight of our citizens. I wish they could see the efforts I've made to address their needs."

LineNo: 16269046,

Sal Ignacius: It's unfortunate that sometimes ou...
en


"It's unfortunate that sometimes our efforts go unnoticed by those we seek to help. In any case..."

LineNo: 16269148,

Sal Ignacius: While I agree that citizens should...
en


"While I agree that citizens should take responsibility, we must also ensure they have the necessary support and resources to do so effectively. In any case..."

LineNo: 16269250,

Sal Ignacius: Yes, however, neglecting their con...
en


"Yes, however, neglecting their concerns could breed resentment and undermine the kingdom's stability even more."

LineNo: 16269352,

Sal Ignacius: It's important to listen to their...
en


"It's important to listen to their grievances. In any case..."

LineNo: 16269732,

Narrator: The struggling market, thanks in la...
en


The struggling market, thanks in large part to the collapse of new businesses and the ongoing energy crisis hadn't helped either.

LineNo: 16270112,

Narrator: The struggling market, thanks in la...
en


The struggling market, thanks in large part to the collapse of new businesses hadn't helped either.

LineNo: 16270492,

Narrator: The struggling market, thanks in pa...
en


The struggling market, thanks in part to the collapse of new businesses, was one such concern.

LineNo: 16270594,

Narrator: The struggling market, thanks in pa...
en


The struggling market, thanks in part to the collapse of new businesses and the ongoing energy crisis, were two such concerns.

LineNo: 16270974,

Sal Ignacius: The Crown's policy toward Rizia's...
en


"The Crown's policy toward Rizia's religious communities is one such policy that hasn't won you any favors."

LineNo: 16273022,

Sal Ignacius: The Crown's policy toward Rizia's...
en


"The Crown's policy toward Rizia's religious communities hasn't won you any favors either."

LineNo: 16273124,

Sal Ignacius: Especially with Wruhecists, which...
en


"Especially with Wruhecists, which may come as a surprise."

LineNo: 16273226,

Sal Ignacius: Especially with Golcondists, which...
en


"Especially with Golcondists, which should come as no surprise."

LineNo: 16273328,

Sal Ignacius: But what you may find surprising i...
en


"But what you may find surprising is the dissatisfaction among Wruhecists."

LineNo: 16273430,

Sal Ignacius: Especially with Dastnurists, and,...
en


"Especially with Dastnurists, and, surprisingly, fellow Wruhecists."

LineNo: 16273532,

Sal Ignacius: Especially with Dastnurists, and,...
en


"Especially with Dastnurists, and, not surprisingly, Golcondists."

LineNo: 16273634,

Sal Ignacius: Especially with Golcondists, which...
en


"Especially with Golcondists, which, I'm sorry to say, should come as no surprise."

LineNo: 16273736,

Sal Ignacius: Especially with Dastnurists.
en


"Especially with Dastnurists."

LineNo: 16274116,

Sal Ignacius: The war in Pales, for one, has hit...
en


"The war in Pales, for one, has hit Rizians especially hard, with support reaching its lowest point since the war began."

LineNo: 16274496,

Sal Ignacius: The war in Pales has also hit Rizi...
en


"The war in Pales has also hit Rizians especially hard, with support reaching its lowest point since the war began."

LineNo: 16274876,

Sal Ignacius: And the number of war refugees flo...
en


"And the number of war refugees flooding across our borders has only added to that tension from their added strain on resources."

LineNo: 16275630,

Sal Ignacius: With all that in mind, I hate to s...
en


"With all that in mind, I hate to say it, but it isn't all that surprising why Malenyevist revolutionaries are gaining support among the populace."

LineNo: 16275732,

Sal Ignacius: For instance, the gain in support...
en


"For instance, the gain in support for Malenyevists revolutionaries among the populace."

LineNo: 16275834,

Narrator: The sound of the Archsantuary doors...
en


The sound of the Archsantuary doors opening drew our attention to the front entrance, where people began trickling inside.

LineNo: 16275936,

Narrator: Sal and I stepped away from the mai...
en


Sal and I stepped away from the main aisle, allowing the flow of individuals to pass without obstruction. We then made our way up the back stairwell to the upper balcony where we could speak privately while still overlooking the scene below.

LineNo: 16276038,

Sal Ignacius: But as I was saying, while the unr...
en


"But as I was saying, while the unrest we're seeing is certainly troubling, I have faith that God will see us through it."

LineNo: 16276164,

Player_Romus: I wish I shared your optimism. Jus...
en


"I wish I shared your optimism. Just thinking about it makes my head explode."

LineNo: 16276266,

Player_Romus: Every day, I hope for a peaceful r...
en


"Every day, I hope for a peaceful resolution. However, I'm concerned that we may need to consider more assertive measures."

LineNo: 16276368,

Player_Romus: What it comes down to is that thes...
en


"What it comes down to is that these agitators are confusing tolerance for weakness. It's a misunderstanding I intend to rectify."

LineNo: 16276470,

Player_Romus: Every day, I offer prayers for a p...
en


"Every day, I offer prayers for a peaceful resolution. Yet, I cannot help but fear that more assertive measures may become necessary."

LineNo: 16276850,

Player_Romus: It just feels like we've exhausted...
en


"It just feels like we've exhausted all available resources to placate their demands -- that no matter what I do, it will never be good enough."

LineNo: 16276952,

Sal Ignacius: Your Majesty, while it may seem th...
en


"Your Majesty, while it may seem that way, we mustn't lose hope."

LineNo: 16277054,

Sal Ignacius: Indeed, Your Majesty. Clarifying t...
en


"Indeed, Your Majesty. Clarifying that distinction is essential to maintaining order and authority."

LineNo: 16277156,

Sal Ignacius: It's understandable to feel overwh...
en


"It's understandable to feel overwhelmed, but remember, you're not alone in this. God is always with you."

LineNo: 16277258,

Sal Ignacius: I share your hope for peace, but I...
en


"I share your hope for peace, but I also understand your concerns. It's wise to remain vigilant and consider all options, even if they require a more assertive approach."

LineNo: 16277360,

Sal Ignacius: Even in the darkest hours, there's...
en


"Even in the darkest hours, there's always a glimmer of hope that the odds, no matter how daunting they may seem, will be overcome."

LineNo: 16277462,

Sal Ignacius: And for what it's worth, you have...
en


"And for what it's worth, you have my too."

LineNo: 16277564,

Narrator: Our attention was drawn to a commot...
en


Our attention was drawn to a commotion from down below as the majestic tones of an organ resonated throughout the chamber.

LineNo: 16277666,

Narrator: A seemingly never-ending column of...
en


A seemingly never-ending column of Wruhec's Guardian cadets began marching down the front aisle, their formal uniforms adding to the solemnity of the occasion.

LineNo: 16277902,

Player_Romus: Remind me, how long does their tra...
en


"Remind me, how long does their training last?"

LineNo: 16278004,

Player_Romus: Why are a select few wearing diffe...
en


"Why are a select few wearing different uniforms?"

LineNo: 16278106,

Player_Romus: Good to know. We can speak more ab...
en


"Good to know. We can speak more about them some other time."

LineNo: 16278208,

Player_Romus: How many are there?
en


"How many are there?"

LineNo: 16279390,

Sal Ignacius: There are over 2,500, Your Majesty...
en


"There are over 2,500, Your Majesty -- a mere fraction of the cadets enrolled across Rizia."

LineNo: 16279492,

Sal Ignacius: Those are the elite cadets, Your M...
en


"Those are the elite cadets, Your Majesty, known as 'The Devout.'"

LineNo: 16279594,

Sal Ignacius: Physical fitness and defense train...
en


"Physical fitness and defense training lasts for 10 weeks, followed by an additional 6 weeks of spiritual training, Your Majesty."

LineNo: 16279696,

Sal Ignacius: They are the most dedicated, having...
en


They are the most dedicated, having undergone a rigorous spiritual experience by staring into the Lake of Reflection for seven days and nights without food or water."

LineNo: 16279798,

Sal Ignacius: This experience makes them officer...
en


"This experience makes them officers and leaders among their peers."

LineNo: 16280278,

Sal Ignacius: It would be my pleasure.
en


"It would be my pleasure."

LineNo: 16280380,

Narrator: Once the cadets were finished takin...
en


Once the cadets were finished taking their perspective seats in the front row, a speaker stepped into the pulpit and began the commencement.

LineNo: 16280482,

Narrator: Sal leaned in and spoke in a hushed...
en


Sal leaned in and spoke in a hushed tone.

LineNo: 16280584,

Sal Ignacius: If I may speak freely, Your Majest...
en


"If I may speak freely, Your Majesty... given the upheaval we're seeing in the kingdom, I feel there is a solution that's being overlooked and not being used to its full potential."

LineNo: 16280964,

Sal Ignacius: An answer that is staring us right...
en


"An answer that is staring us right in the face."

LineNo: 16281066,

Narrator: Sal gestured to the cadets.
en


Sal gestured to the cadets.

LineNo: 16281168,

Sal Ignacius: The Wruhec's Guardians. Presently,...
en


"The Wruhec's Guardians. Presently, they've been tasked with performing faith-based humanitarian work around the kingdom, such as rebuilding infrastructure in the war-torn regions and providing aid to displaced families."

LineNo: 16281270,

Sal Ignacius: Despite their commendable efforts...
en


"Despite their commendable efforts and the positive attention they're generating, including recruitment, it's been insufficient to quell the unrest."

LineNo: 16281372,

Sal Ignacius: Perhaps it's time for them to set...
en


"Perhaps it's time for them to set aside the plowshares and to wield the sword of justice."

LineNo: 16281490,

Player_Romus: I think you may be right. The Wruh...
en


"I think you may be right. The Wruhec's Guardians have proven their dedication and capability in serving our kingdom. Their numbers are growing, and they are becoming a force to be reckoned with."

LineNo: 16281592,

Sal Ignacius: I'm pleased to hear it.
en


"I'm pleased to hear it."

LineNo: 16281694,

Sal Ignacius: Legally speaking, we have the auth...
en


"Legally speaking, we have the authority to deploy the Wruhec's Guardians to maintain order and uphold the divine laws of our land."

LineNo: 16281796,

Sal Ignacius: As you are God's representative on...
en


"As you are God's representative on earth, earthly laws are no different from godly laws, and vice versa."

LineNo: 16281898,

Sal Ignacius: Disregard of divine laws is punish...
en


"Disregard of divine laws is punishable on earth as it is in the eyes of the Almighty."

LineNo: 16282000,

Player_Romus: Then it's settled. See to it that...
en


"Then it's settled. See to it that the Wruhec's Guardians are given everything they need to fulfill their duty. It's time for them to step into their rightful role as enforcers of justice in our kingdom."

LineNo: 16282006,

Player_Romus: Then it's settled. See to it that...
Menu Text en


"Then it's settled. See to it that the Wruhec Guardians are given everything they need to fulfill their duty. It's time for them to step into their rightful role as enforcers of justice in our kingdom." [-1 Budget]

LineNo: 16282426,

Player_Romus: The Wruhec's Guardians. They've be...
en


"The Wruhec's Guardians. They've been doing commendable work thus far, I won't deny that. But deploying them to quell unrest... Are we certain this is the right course of action?"

LineNo: 16282528,

Sal Ignacius: Your Majesty, legally speaking, we...
en


"Your Majesty, legally speaking, we have the authority to deploy the Wruhec's Guardians to maintain order."

LineNo: 16282630,

Sal Ignacius: As the appointed representative of...
en


"As the appointed representative of God on earth, you have the power to enforce divine laws."

LineNo: 16282748,

Player_Romus: I understand, Sal. But using them...
en


"I understand, Sal. But using them for such purposes... I now worry about the potential for public backlash."

LineNo: 16282850,

Sal Ignacius: I understand your hesitation, but...
en


"I understand your hesitation, but in times of crisis, we must be prepared to take necessary measures. The Wruhec's Guardians can serve as a strong deterrent against further violence and unrest."

LineNo: 16282952,

Player_Romus: Very well. We must do what is nece...
en


"Very well. We must do what is necessary to restore peace and order to our kingdom. See to it that the Wruhec's Guardians are prepared for their new duties."

LineNo: 16282958,

Player_Romus: Very well. We must do what is nece...
Menu Text en


"Very well. We must do what is necessary to restore peace and order to our kingdom. See to it that the Wruhec Guardians are prepared for their new duties." [-1 Budget]

LineNo: 16283060,

Player_Romus: They've certainly been busy, I'll g...
en


They've certainly been busy, I'll grant you that. But deploying them to handle unrest... I'm not entirely convinced it's the right approach."

LineNo: 16283162,

Sal Ignacius: Legally speaking, we do have the a...
en


"Legally speaking, we do have the authority to utilize the Wruhec's Guardians in this capacity."

LineNo: 16283264,

Sal Ignacius: As the earthly representative of G...
en


"As the earthly representative of God, enforcing divine laws falls under your purview."

LineNo: 16283382,

Player_Romus: Yes, but using them for such purpo...
en


"Yes, but using them for such purposes... It feels like a drastic measure. Not to mention, we can't risk infringing upon personal freedoms in the name of order."

LineNo: 16283484,

Sal Ignacius: I understand your hesitation, Your...
en


"I understand your hesitation, Your Majesty. But the situation is dire, and we must consider all available options. The Wruhec's Guardians can help maintain stability and prevent further escalation of violence."

LineNo: 16283586,

Player_Romus: I appreciate your perspective, Sal...
en


"I appreciate your perspective, Sal. But for now, I'm not inclined to deploy the Wruhec's Guardians in this manner."

LineNo: 16283688,

Sal Ignacius: Understood, Your Majesty. I will e...
en


"Understood, Your Majesty. I will ensure that the Wruhec's Guardians persist in their current endeavors, although I must confess, I am disappointed by your decision."

LineNo: 16283790,

Sal Ignacius: Of course, Your Majesty. I will ma...
en


"Of course, Your Majesty. I will make the necessary preparations to ensure that the Wruhec's Guardians are ready to fulfill their new responsibilities."

LineNo: 16283892,

Sal Ignacius: Indeed, Your Majesty. I will ensur...
en


"Indeed, Your Majesty. I will ensure that the Wruhec's Guardians are fully prepared to uphold justice and restore order in our kingdom."

LineNo: 16283994,

Player_Romus: And I get that. But just because w...
en


"And I get that. But just because we *can* deploy them doesn't mean that we should."

LineNo: 16284096,

Player_Romus: While I agree with everything you'...
en
